Title: Requires state contractors to submit a statement on preventing human trafficking
Summary: Requires state contractors to submit a statement on preventing human trafficking in bids to the state and maintain a written policy for preventing human trafficking within its operations, business dealings, and supply chain and provide to the state a copy of such policy when submitting such statement.
LawCode: Add ยง139-d-1, amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring state contractors submit a statement on human trafficking
